contentrichtext.text: '''Castle Hill''' may refer to: ==Places== ===Australia=== * Castle Hill, a small hill and land area in [[Bicton, Western Australia]] * [[Castle Hill, New South Wales]], a suburb of Sydney * [[Castle Hill, Queensland]], a suburb of Townsville ===United Kingdom=== * [[Castle Hill, Birmingham]], an area in the centre of [[Dudley]] * [[Castle Hill, Brighton]], a Site of Special Scientific Interest near Brighton, East Sussex * [[Castle Hill, Cambridge]], a hill and street in Cambridge * [[Castlehill, Dumbarton]], in Scotland * [[Castlehill, Edinburgh]] * [[Castle Hill, Alwinton]], Iron Age hillfort in Northumberland * [[Castle Hill, Filleigh]], a privately owned Palladian House in North Devon * [[Castle Hill, Folkestone]], a hill on the North Downs near Folkestone, Kent * [[Castle Hill, Hampshire]], Iron Age fortification the New Forest in Hampshire * [[Castle Hill, Huddersfield]], in the county of West Yorkshire in England * [[Castle Hill, Mere]], in Wiltshire, England * [[Castle Hill, Oxfordshire]], part of Wittenham Clumps * [[Castle Hill, Thetford]], an earthwork fortification in Thetford, Norfolk * [[Castle Hill, Torrington]], Iron Age earthworks and hill fort in Devon * [[Castle Hill, Kingston]], a [[Local Nature Reserve]] in London ===United States=== <!--alpha "Castle Hill" by state, then "Castle Hills"--> * [[Castle Hill (Sitka, Alaska)]], an archaeological site * [[Castle Hill, California]], a census-designated place * [[Castle Hill, Maine]], a town in Aroostook County * [[Castle Hill (Ipswich, Massachusetts)]], a historic house * [[Castle Hill, Bronx]], New York, a neighborhood in New York City * [[Castle Hill Light]], Newport, Rhode Island, a historic lighthouse and inn * [[Castle Hill (Virginia)]], a historic plantation in Albemarle County * [[Castle Hills, Texas]], a small city in Bexar County ===Other countries=== <!-- alpha by country --> * [[Castle Hill, Antigua and Barbuda]], on the island of Barbuda * [[Castle Hill, Newfoundland and Labrador]], Canada * [[Castle Hill, Buda]], the oldest part of the Hungarian capital * [[Castlehill]], a village in County Mayo, Ireland * [[Castle Hill, New Zealand]] * [[Castle Hill, Ljubljana]], Slovenia, location of the Ljubljana Castle * [[Zamkova Hora (Kiev)|Castle Hill]], in [[Kiev]], [[Ukraine]] ==Ships== *{{SS|Castle Hill}}, a British cargo ship in service 1949-50 ==See also== * [[Schlossberg (disambiguation)]], for a number of articles named ''Castle Hill'' in German {{geodis}}
